Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.scenes

Class GUIScene

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.scenes.GUIScene
Direct Known Subclasses:
EndGameScene, ErrorScene, LoginScene, NotMyTurnScene, NumberOfPlayersScene, PutCardsScene, SavedGamesScene, TakeCardsScene
public abstract class GUIScene extends Object
Abstract class for all the GUI Scenes

      Parameters:

      Sets the scene based on the number of players in the game

    • setPlayersShared

      protected void setPlayersShared(ClientController clientController, javafx.scene.control.MenuButton destinationMenu, javafx.scene.control.Button sendMessage)
      A shared method called by different scenes to initialize chat field.
      Parameters:
      clientController - a reference to the client controller.
      destinationMenu - the button that allows the player to select the recipient of the chat message.
      sendMessage - the button that allows the player to send the message.

    • updateCurrPlayer

      public void updateCurrPlayer(String player)
      Updates the current player
      Parameters:
      player - is the curren player

    • updateSelectedTiles

      public void updateSelectedTiles(Map<Integer,ItemCard> selectedTiles)
      Shows the Tiles selected from the player in the TakeCard scene
      Parameters:
      selectedTiles - contains the Tiles selected by the player and their position on the Board

      public void updateBoard(ItemCard[][] board)
      Prints the Board in the scene
      Parameters:
      board - is the updated Board

      public void changeBoard(Integer[] tilesToRemove)
      Updates the Board removing the given Tiles
      Parameters:
      tilesToRemove - contains the ItemCard to remove and its position on the Board

    • updateBookshelf

      public void updateBookshelf(String nickname, ItemCard[][] bookshelf)
      Prints the player's Bookshelf in the scene
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the owner of the Bookshelf
      bookshelf - is the player's updated Bookshelf

    • changeBookshelf

      public void changeBookshelf(Map<Integer,ItemCard> tilesToAdd, String player)
      Updates the player's Bookshelf adding the given Tiles
      Parameters:
      tilesToAdd - contains the ItemCard to add and its position on the Bookshelf
      player - is the owner of the Bookshelf to modify

    • bookshelfCompleted

      public void bookshelfCompleted()
      Prints that a player has completed its bookshelf and delete the image for the completion point

    • comGoal

      public void comGoal(Map<Integer,Integer> playerCommonGoal)
      Prints the CommonGoals and its available score in the scene
      Parameters:
      playerCommonGoal - contains the CommonGoalID and its available score

    • updateCommonGoal

      public void updateCommonGoal(int comGoalDoneID, int newValue)
      Updates the available score of a CommonGoal each time it is reached and in the scene
      Parameters:
      comGoalDoneID - identifies the CommonGoal reached
      newValue - is the available score

    • comGoalDone

      protected void comGoalDone(int comGoalDoneID, int newValue, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane score_0, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane score_1, int height)
      A protected method shared by different scenes to update common goals' scores.
      Parameters:
      comGoalDoneID - the id ot the common goal to be updated.
      newValue - : the remained score.
      score_0 - the grid pane with the first common goal's score.
      score_1 - the grid pane with the second common goal's score.
      height - the height of the score image.

    • comGoalCreated

      protected void comGoalCreated(Map<Integer,Integer> playerCommonGoal, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane score_0, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane score_1, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane comGoals, boolean horizontal, int height, int width, int imgHeight)
      A protected method shared by different scenes to create common goals' cards.
      Parameters:
      playerCommonGoal - the common goals for the game.
      score_0 - the grid pane for the first common goal's score.
      score_1 - the grid pane for the second common goal's score.
      comGoals - the grid pane for the common goals' cards.
      horizontal - a boolean that is true if the scene has common goals cards in horizontal, false anyway.
      height - the height of the common goal image.
      width - the width of the common goal image.
      imgHeight - the height of the score image.

    • persGoal

      public void persGoal(String newValue)
      Prints the PersonalGoal assigned to the player
      Parameters:
      newValue - is the PersonalGoal name

    • sendChat

      protected void sendChat(InputController inputController, ClientController clientController, javafx.scene.control.MenuButton destinationMenu, javafx.scene.control.TextField writtenMessage)
      A method shared by different scenes to send chat's messages.
      Parameters:
      inputController - a reference to the input controller.
      clientController - a reference to the client controller.
      destinationMenu - the button that allows players to select the recipient of the message.
      writtenMessage - the text field that contains the message.

    • printPoints

      public void printPoints(int myPoint)
      Prints the player's points in the scene
      Parameters:
      myPoint - are the points of the player

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(String sender, String message)
      Prints the message in the chat field of the scene
      Parameters:
      sender - is the player that sent the message
      message - is the message to print

    • printError

      public void printError(String error)
      Prints an error message in the scene
      Parameters:
      error - is the error message to display

    • finalScores

      public void finalScores(LinkedHashMap<String,Integer> finalScores)
      Displays the final ranking of the game, showing the score of each player
      Parameters:
      finalScores - contains the players' nicknames and their score

    • closeGame

      public static void closeGame(ClientController clientController)
      Called in all the scenes when the player clicks on close button, asks him if he wants to be disconnected from the game and closes the connection in case of confirmation.
      Parameters:
      clientController - a reference to the client controller.

    • help

      protected void help()
      Called when the user clicks on “help” button in TakeCardsScene and NotMyTurnScene, to show a new window with the game's instructions.

    • comGoalInfo

      protected void comGoalInfo(int comGoalID)
      Called on mouse-clicked on a common goal to show its details.
      Parameters:
      comGoalID - the ID of the common goal to be explained.

    • getChatMessage

      public String getChatMessage()
      Return the chat message box for the next scene

      the chat message box for the next scene

      Return the chat recipient for the next scene
      Returns:
      the chat recipient box for the next scene

      public void putChatMessage(String message)
      Set the chat message in the chat box
      Parameters:
      message - the message got in the other scene

    • putChatReceiver

      public void putChatReceiver(String Receiver)
      Set the recipient in the receiver box
      Parameters:
      Receiver - the recipient got in the other scene
